## Description

A clear and concise description of the bug.

## Steps to Reproduce

1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '...'
3. See error

## Expected Behaviour

What you expected to happen.

## Actual Behaviour

What actually happened. Include error messages, screenshots, or stack traces if possible.

## Environment

- OS: [e.g. macOS 14, Ubuntu 22.04]
- Node version: [e.g. 20.x]
- Browser (if UI bug): [e.g. Chrome 120]

## Additional Context

Any other context about the problem.
